Reviews.Title: Worked gread
Reviews.Author: Dre
Reviews.Content: Used to extend a 50 meter cable. No loss in signal, worked great, great price.  Power cable had female at one and and make at other just like all other cables, and the endings' size was just right.

Reviews.Title: Works well, should be cheaper.
Reviews.Author: tuned
Reviews.Content: Works well, should be cheaper. I replaced 2 of the the original Night Owl thinner longer cables with these. One N-O camera actually looked slightly better daytime, go figure. I expected both to benefit. One of the cameras is aftermarket, twice the specs and a few more IRs. I expected that one to benefit more but it ain't so.

Reviews.Title: Good value.....
Reviews.Author: Rl Shuey
Reviews.Content: Does the job at half the cost of the 50 ft cables. I bought these because I couldn't find 20 footers in black anymore (these were about the same price as the 20 ft. ones, but I have twice as much cable as I need). All in all, I'm happy!

Reviews.Title: Thin cable
Reviews.Author: JOE
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your time and money, the cable is too thin, so my camera can't get a clear signal. I used it for about one day, and then it doesn't work. I hope it thicker and stronger, then it will not be so much problem. Waste of money!

ProductInfo.Features:
This Cable Is Compatible for CCTV Camera and Other CCTV Surveillance Systems.
10 Meters Cable Is Applied to Video Output for CCTV Surveillance Systems or Home Security  System.
The Cable Is 10 Meters Long and Mainly Used in The Indoor Environment,Such as Home, Office,   ect..
Cable Surface Material: PVC insulation, Cable Conductor Material: Copper.
The Cable Includes 4 Plug Ports: 2 x BNC Plug, 1 x DC-in Plug, 1 x Video output Plug.
ProductInfo.Name: SecurityIng - 2 Pack 32.8 Feet (10 Meters) Black BNC Video Cable for Security CCTV Surveillance System
